name: GATE (itch)
description:
GATE is a platform puzzle project I made for school. 

You are cursed with others who move as you do, and won't pass through the gates on your own. You have to find your way out to the last gate to be free. 

Sounds: yottasounds, dland, rhodesmas
Music: self made with Music Maker Jam

Install instructions
1) Download the zip file
2) Unzip the zip file
3) Launch .exe
